column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////All the food was perfectly cooked and seasoned
column2: and arrived at our table right on time. My mom daringly tried the grilled octopus and loved it! (as did I). The sangria was delicious and the smaller-sized desserts (like the champagne
column3: also on the house) turned out to be perfectly portioned by virtue of having such rich flavor.
